CUSTOM_DND5E.clientSettings.label: Client Settings
CUSTOM_DND5E.clientSettings.note: These settings only affect the current user and are configurable by each user.
CUSTOM_DND5E.label: Label
CUSTOM_DND5E.reachedCounterLimit: You've reached the limit for this counter!
CUSTOM_DND5E.spendCampSupplies.label: Spend Camp Supplies?
CUSTOM_DND5E.spendCampSupplies.hint: Do you need to spend camp supplies?
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.label: Weight Modifiers
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.note.1: These settings do not stack. The lower modifier will be used where multiple modifiers apply to an item.
CUSTOM_DND5E.weightModifiers.note.2: 0 will reduce an item's weight by 100%, 0.5 will reduce an item's weight by 50%, 1.25 will increase an item's weight by 25%
CUSTOM_DND5E.worldSettings.label: World Settings
CUSTOM_DND5E.worldSettings.note: These settings affect all users and are only configurable by the GM.
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.delete.content: This will also delete the item from all actors. Do you wish to continue?
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.delete.title: Delete Item
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.importData.different: Failed to import configuration as the file's version '{fileVersion}' is different to the installed version '{currentVersion}'
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.importData.settingsN: No module settings were found in the provided file
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.importData.configNot: No system configurations were found in the provided file
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.importData.note.1: Choose a Custom D&D 5e configuration file
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.importData.note.2: This action will overwrite the existing Custom D&D 5e configuration
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.levelUpHitPointsRero: When rolling for Hit Points, if the first roll is below {minimumValue}, the die will automatically reroll once, taking the second result.
When rolling for Hit Points, the die will reroll until the result is at least {minimumValue}.
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.reset.content: This will reset everything back to the system configuration. Do you wish to continue?
CUSTOM_DND5E.dialog.reset.title: Reset Configuration

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.counters.viewRole.note: Allow users with this role (and above) to view the counter
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.counters.key.note.1: The key must be unique across all counters of the same actor type: character or NPC

Enable debugging messages in the browser's console
Make sure to disable during normal play
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.debug.exportData.label: Export Data
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.debug.exportData.note: Export the module's settings and configuration to file
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.debug.importData.label: Import Data
Import the module's settings and configuration from file
All existing data will be overwritten
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.debug.title: Debug Settings
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.encumbrance.title: Configure Encumbrance
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.bloodied.ap: Apply the Bloodied condition when a character or NPC is reduced to half HP or lower
Enabling this will disable D&D 5e's Bloodied Status setting
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.bloodied.bl: Icon for the Bloodied status effect
Color to tint the token when it has the Bloodied condition
Must be in hex color format. Leave blank for no tint
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.bloodied.re: Remove the Bloodied condition when a creature has the Dead status effect
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.dead.applyD: Apply the Dead status effect when an NPC is reduced to 0 HP
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.dead.applyI: Apply Instant Death when a character suffers damage equal or greater than their remaining HP plus their max HP
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.dead.deadRo: Angle to rotate the token when it has the Dead status effect
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.dead.deadTi: Color to tint the token when it has the Dead status effect
Must be in hex color format. Leave blank for no tint
The roll mode when rolling Death Saving Throws
When Blind GM Roll is selected, successes and failures won't appear on the character sheet for players
The value required to succeed a death saving throw
Use 3 to remove all, 1 to remove one and 0 to remove none
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.hitPoints.a: Apply Massive Damage when a character suffers damage equal to or greater than half their max HP
Apply negative hit points for characters
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.hitPoints.n: Heal from 0 HP when a character has negative HP
Reroll Initiative for all combatants at the start of each round
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.inspiration: Value to roll on the d20 to award Inspiration
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.prone.prone: Angle to rotate the token when it has the Prone status effect
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.resting.use: When taking a Long Rest, optionally require spending Camp Supplies
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.rollingHitP: Automatically reroll when result is below the minimum value
Roll HP for NPCs when dragging their token onto the canvas
Reroll once, otherwise reroll until minimum is met
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.unconscious: Apply the Unconscious status effect when a PC is reduced to 0 HP
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.houseRules.title: Configure House Rules
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.itemActionTypes.title: Configure Item Action Types
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.itemProperties.title: Configure Item Properties

CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.autoFadeSheet.no: Automatically fade out the sheet when it is not hovered over
Press CTRL to keep the faded view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the full view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.autoMinimiseShee: Automatically minimise the sheet when it is not hovered over
Press CTRL to keep the minimized view while moving onto the sheet, and press CTRL to keep the maximized view while moving off the sheet.
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.bannerImage.note: Select an image to use as the banner on the character sheet
Recommended image size is 800px by 170px. Leave blank to use the default
Change the scale of the new character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.sheetScale.label: Sheet Scale
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showDeathSaves.n: Show death saves tracking on the character sheet
Show encumbrance on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showExhaustion.n: Show exhaustion tracking on the character sheet
Show the Inspiration button on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showLegendaryAct: Show Legendary Actions on the NPC sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showLegendaryRes: Show Legendary Resistance on the NPC sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showManageCurren: Show the Manage Currency button on the character sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.showUseLairActio: Show Use Lair Action on the NPC sheet
CUSTOM_DND5E.form.sheet.title: Configure Sheet

CUSTOM_DND5E.setting.radialStatusEffects: Display status effects in a circle around the token
CUSTOM_DND5E.setting.tokenBorderShape.hi: Choose the shape of the token's border when it is selected or hovered
CUSTOM_DND5E.setting.applyElevationToSel: When applying elevation via a token's HUD, apply it to all selected tokens
CUSTOM_DND5E.setting.showPressedKeys.hin: Displays an icon near the cursor when the Skip Dialog, Advantage, or Disadvantage keys are pressed
CUSTOM_DND5E.setting.toggleStatusEffectO: When toggling a status effect via a token's HUD, toggle it for all selected tokens
